name: Bouncing DVD : The Game
description: Hit the DVD into the corner. Can you beat the high score?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU N3350 @ 1.10GHz Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio(SST)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU N3350 @ 1.10GHz Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio(SST)
